name: Potion Seller (Noteworthy, FrancisVace)
description:
Potion Seller! We require your strongest potions! 

Learn the ins and outs of brewing, and become a Potion Seller. Craft the most powerful potions, and improve your skills at the art of Alchemy. 

Find out the most efficient combinations of ingredients to create your potions, experiment with  and link together different alchemical agents and improve your knowledge!

Tutorial: 
Complete your order (Top Left Prompt) by placing ingredients into your cauldron to see their effect. 

Certain effects can cancel each other out, or when joined in the Mortar, create new compound effects. 

Potion slurry in the Cauldron or the Mortar can be transferred to the the other respective vessel by clicking on it with an empty hand.

When you think your potion is done, click on the spigot or empty glass vial, to bottle your potion and see your score. 

The potions will get progressively more complex, the more you do, and the better you are doing, feel free to experiment, and feel free to post your favourite potion combinations in the comments below

Thanks for playing our game!

A game for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam, 2021.
